message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got a good deal in round 1, I'll try to do better this time
You're trying to take advantage, but I'm not falling for it!
You're trying to take advantage, but I'm not falling for it! (my turn)
You're not getting the better deal this time, Bob!
I think I can do better than that, Alice. Let's try again!
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob!
I'm not willing to give up that much, Alice. I think I'm close to getting a good deal
You're running out of chances, Bob!
I'm not going to give up, Alice. I'll try to squeeze out a good deal
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to settle for that, Alice. I want a better deal than that
This is the last straw, Bob. Take it or leave it, but I'm not budging!
I'm not going to back down now, Alice. I want the better deal
I'm done negotiating, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but I'm not making another move.
Fine, have it your way, Alice. I'll take the last dollar, but I'm not happy about it.
You've had your chance, Bob. You're getting the whole $10,000. Congratulations.
